job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field

jd: From: Subhra Mallick, Adventa Tech subhra@adventatech.com Reply to: subhra@adventatech.com Title : Software/.NET (Mobile) Engineer Duration : 12+Months Location : Roseville, MN Job Type : Onsite Visa : GC / USCMOI : SKYPE Linkedin is must. MUST HAVE: Technical lead for team of multiple software engineers Architect, develop, verify, and maintain scalable, efficient software solutions Work closely with systems, hardware, and firmware engineers to define software requirements Define and own processes for development, implementation, and test of software Conduct code reviews to ensure deliverables meet quality standards Potentially, lead and organize collaboration with external development contractors / companies Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field 10 plus years of experience in software development Experience developing mobile applications and with mobile development tools/frameworks (e.g. Xamarin) Proficiency in programming languages such as Csharp, Kotlin, and Java Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g. AWS) and mobile backend services Strong understanding of software development tools and version control systems Ability to organize work and lead other engineers Strong communication, collaboration, and teamwork skills Experience with Bluetooth wireless communication
